name: fantasy_creatures
description: Magical fantasy transformations with mythical beings
author: StarStitch

global_scene.location_prompt: enchanted magical forest, mystical atmosphere, ethereal lighting, fantasy art style, high detail, 4k
global_scene.negative_prompt: blurry, distorted, low quality, modern elements, technology

sequence.name: Human
sequence.visual_prompt: Person in medieval fantasy clothes, curious expression

sequence.name: Elf
sequence.visual_prompt: Elegant elf with pointed ears, silver hair, ethereal beauty

sequence.name: Dragon
sequence.visual_prompt: Majestic dragon with shimmering scales, wise ancient eyes, powerful presence
